title: Thugs of the Forest
creator_credit: Campbell Manderson, Pip Starr and SKA TV
brief_description: An expose of the attack on Goolengook protesters who were ambushed in the middle of the night by a group of angry foresters.Produced as a news story for SKA TV’s Access News, a grass-roots alternative to mainstream news and current affairs, broadcast weekly on Melbourne’s Community Television station Channel 31 since 1994. WARNING : STRONG LANGUAGE - NOT suitable for General Audience
